abstract.description: Dataset in reduced NanoAOD format for education and outreach derived from the primary dataset in AOD format linked below.

dataset_semantics.description: Run number
Luminosity block number
Event number
Number of primary vertices
Position of the primary vertex in x direction
Position of the primary vertex in y direction
Position of the primary vertex in z direction
Number of muons in this event
Transverse momentum of the muons
Pseudorapidity of the muons
Azimuth angle of the muons
Mass of the muons
Charge of the muons (either 1 or -1)
Distance of the muons to the primary vertex in the transverse plane
Uncertainty on the distance of the muons to the primary vertex in the transverse plane
Distance of the muons to the primary vertex in parallel to the beam pipe
Uncertainty on the distance of the muons to the primary vertex in parallel to the beam pipe
Muon isolation divided by the transverse momentum in the $R=0.3$ cone
Muon isolation divided by the transverse momentum in the $R=0.4$ cone
Number of electrons in this event
Transverse momentum of the electrons
Pseudorapidity of the electrons
Azimuth angle of the electrons
Mass of the electrons
Charge of the electrons (either 1 or -1)
Distance of the electrons to the primary vertex in the transverse plane
Uncertainty on the distance of the electrons to the primary vertex in the transverse plane
Distance of the electrons to the primary vertex in parallel to the beam pipe
Uncertainty on the distance of the electrons to the primary vertex in parallel to the beam pipe
Electron isolation divided by the transverse momentum in the $R=0.3$ cone
Missing transverse energy
Azimuth angle of the missing transverse energy
